txt.en:
'I think I know how to get him to tell us where the archive is.'

Girhâzi has a mischievous grin and looks excited about her idea.

'It is worth a try, anyway. We will talk to him together. Let me know when you are ready to go.'
You and Girhâzi succeeded in getting Khûldim Umûn to tell you where the lost archive is. You should talk to Girhâzi.
Girhâzi has an idea for how to get Khûldim Umûn to divulge the location of the lost library of Dubarâkh, and she needs your help.

'Ha! That was as fun as I thought it would be. You did well! Thank you for that. I must say though, I still do not trust him, and it would be just like him to lead us into a trap. Sometimes though, walking into a trap is what must be done.

'I will go personally, as I would never send Dumûri to do a thing that I would not do myself. And I will bring Khûldim along so that whatever fate befalls us will be his fate as well.'

You ask Girhâzi how she knew you were at the Pelennor and the Black Gate. She gives you a hearty laugh and a wink.

'I didn't! Until now.'
'Are you ready? Just go along with whatever I am saying.'
Talk to Girhâzi when you are ready to question Khûldim Umûn again.
